scripts.emulator: cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && firebase emulators:start --import=emulator-data --export-on-exit=emulator-data
scripts.deploy:rules: firebase deploy --only firestore:rules && firebase deploy --only storage
scripts.gc:logout: (cd scripts/terraform && gcloud auth application-default revoke && gcloud auth revoke)
scripts.tf:plan:dev: npm run tf:init && (cd scripts/terraform && terraform plan -var-file=development.tfvars)
scripts.tf:apply:dev: npm run tf:init && (cd scripts/terraform && terraform apply -var-file=development.tfvars)
scripts.clean: npm run clean:modules && rm package-lock.json functions/package-lock.json
scripts.install:all: (cd functions && npm i && cd .. && npm i)
